import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"header"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/header"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get Header at a specified height.

If the `height` field is set to a non-default value, upon success, the
`Cache-Control` header will be set with the default maximum age.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"height","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0,"example":1},"description":"height to return. If no height is provided, it will fetch the latest header."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
